moves.3... a6 4. Ba4 b5: Weird move order chosen by Black
moves.7. Bd5: This pin looked good at first, then I realized ... Nge7! gives Black the advantage.
moves.7... Bc5: Black decided to free the Bishop first.
moves.8. Bxc6 Bxc6 9. Nxe5: I've made this Knight sacrifice so many times it's not even funny.
moves.9... fxe5 10. Qh5+: In this position, Black has ... Kf8! and there goes White's one-piece attack.
moves.10... g6: Gross blunder - loses a whole rook!
moves.11. Qxe5+ Ne7 12. Qxh8+ Kf7 13. Qxh7+ Kf: Here, Black should play ... Ke6 instead of capturing the pawn.
The discovery attack wins the bishop.
moves.17... Kh5 18. Qh7+: ... but I was hunting for bigger game.

gameName: Black blunders a rook and gets mated in the Ruy Lopez
